text:
Hello
Is there a way to fetch property rules from the property API?
example: I need to know if the deal level currency property is using company currency or deal currency.

Thanks in advance

Hello,

i am trying to associate a custom object to contacts and below is my API Request

<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/2-17395031/9657566786>/associations/default/contacts/11351/

but when i try running this i am getting unable to infer object
